Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.nolixCommonLibrary.mathematics.Matrix

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix()
      Creates new identity matrix with default size.
      Matrix(int size)
      Creates new identity matrix with the given size.
      Matrix(int rowsCount, int columnsCount)
      Creates new matrix with the given number of rows and number of columns.
      Matrix(int rowsCount, int columnsCount, double defaultValue)
      Creates new matrix with the given number of rows and columns and whose entries have all the given default value.
      Matrix(Matrix matrix)
      Creates new matrix that is a clone of the given matrix.
      Matrix(Vector... rowVectors)
      Creates new matrix with the given row vectors
